title: [Atoll, Azure Grotto]
description: Cramped and damp, the grotto offers very little space for activities.  Inlets of water trickle in smaller pathways to the centermost point, forming a pool.  A blue crystal reflects blue light into its surroundings, the air around it humming with energy.
